here's my big trick turn the heat on

top for like a good 15 minutes I
honestly don't know why everyone doesn't

those are on the bottom getting blasted
with heat right now also near the bottom
is the super thick part of the breast
that's always lagging it behind the rest

just cut them into some smaller pieces

russet potato I like the

russet skins are gross in mashed
potatoes baked or roasted those skins
are great but boiled they have the
texture of wet construction paper so
that's why I peel this one then I cut it
into a little bigger pieces than the red
potatoes because the russet cooks
